name: Robo-A-Robot
description:
In Robo-A-Robot you will be tasked with aiding Robo through a tricky (or not) maze of rooms safely. He is not the strongest robot and if you continue to run into walls he will perish :(, but I know you won't let that happen to him (right?)!

Using your robot controller you will have to turn on and off his directional buttons to guide Robo through the maze. A solid button is on and a hollow button is off.

I wish you and Robo luck in your 7 level adventure.

You will get 100% better performance by downloading this game. If you like the tutorial and the 4th level slows waaaaaay down. Go and download it instead. Sorry for the inconvenience.
